languages.text: {n}Идира Тласс изумленно взирает на вас, словно увидела призрака. Странная и жутковатая конструкция на ее голове — сплетение мириада тонких полупрозрачных нитей, которые свились причудливыми, тошнотворными узорами на висках псайкера. Множество нитей уходят сквозь кожу вглубь лица, шеи, ключицы.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Вы... живы?"

{n}Idira Tlass is staring at you as if she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head, a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads penetrate the skin of her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира Тласс изумленно взирает на вас, словно увидела призрака. Странная и жутковатая конструкция на ее голове — сплетение мириада тонких полупрозрачных нитей, которые свились причудливыми, тошнотворными узорами на висках псайкера. Множество нитей уходят сквозь кожу вглубь лица, шеи, ключицы.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Вы... живы?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira Tlass is staring at you like she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head — a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads go inside the skin on her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラ・タラースはまるで幽霊を見ているかのようにあなたを見つめている。彼女の頭には奇妙で不気味な見た目の装置が付いており、こめかみには無数の細い半透明の糸が精巧で気持ちの悪い模様を描いて絡まっている。その糸の多くは、彼女の顔、首、鎖骨の皮膚の中に続いている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！あなた…生きていたのね？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira Tlass is staring at you as if she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head, a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads penetrate the skin of her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラ・タラースはまるで幽霊を見ているかのようにあなたを見つめている。彼女の頭には奇妙で不気味な見た目の装置が付いており、こめかみには無数の細い半透明の糸が精巧で気持ちの悪い模様を描いて絡まっている。その糸の多くは、彼女の顔、首、鎖骨の皮膚の中に続いている。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！あなた…生きていたのね？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉·特拉斯盯着你，仿佛见了鬼一样。她头上戴着一个古怪的装置，无数半透明的细线纠缠在她的太阳穴边，盘绕成令人厌恶的精致图案。其中，许多丝线刺入了她的面部、颈部与锁骨处的皮肤。{/n}“舰长大人！你……还活着吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira Tlass is staring at you as if she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head, a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads penetrate the skin of her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉·特拉斯盯着你，仿佛见了鬼一样。她头上戴着一个古怪的装置，无数半透明的细线纠缠在她的太阳穴边，盘绕成令人厌恶的精致图案。其中，许多丝线刺入了她的面部、颈部与锁骨处的皮肤。{/n}“舰长大人！你……还活着吗？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira Tlass te mira como si fueras un fantasma. Tiene un dispositivo extraño e inquietante en la cabeza y una maraña de cientos de hilos delgados y traslúcidos en patrones elaborados y mareantes en sus sienes. Muchos de los hilos atraviesan la piel de su rostro, su cuello y sus clavículas.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! ¿Está... viv{mf|o|a}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira Tlass is staring at you as if she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head, a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads penetrate the skin of her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira Tlass te mira como si fueras un fantasma. Tiene un dispositivo extraño e inquietante en la cabeza y una maraña de cientos de hilos delgados y traslúcidos en patrones elaborados y mareantes en sus sienes. Muchos de los hilos se introducen en su piel en el rostro, el cuello y las clavículas.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! ¿Está... viv{mf|o|a}?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira Tlass starrt dich an, als hätte sie einen Geist gesehen. Auf ihrem Kopf sitzt ein merkwürdiges, unheimlich anmutendes Gerät. Ein Gewirr von unzähligen dünnen, durchsichtigen Fäden, die sich in filigranen, widerwärtigen Mustern um ihre Schläfen wickeln. Viele dieser Fäden durchdringen die Haut in ihrem Gesicht, am Hals und an den Schlüsselbeinen.{/n} "Lord Captain! Ihr ... lebt?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira Tlass is staring at you as if she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head, a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads penetrate the skin of her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira Tlass starrt dich an, als hätte sie einen Geist gesehen. Auf ihrem Kopf sitzt ein merkwürdiges, unheimlich anmutendes Gerät. Ein Gewirr von unzähligen dünnen, durchsichtigen Fäden, die sich in filigranen, widerwärtigen Mustern um ihre Schläfen wickeln. Viele dieser Fäden verschwinden in ihrer Haut, im Gesicht, am Hals und am Schlüsselbein.{/n} "Lord Captain! Ihr ... lebt?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira Tlass vous dévisage comme si elle voyait un fantôme. Elle porte sur la tête un étrange appareil constitué d'un enchevêtrement de fils translucides venant former sur ses tempes un motif élaboré qui vous donne mal au cœur. Bon nombre de ces fils s'enfoncent dans la peau de son visage, de son cou et de ses épaules.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous êtes... en vie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira Tlass is staring at you as if she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head, a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads penetrate the skin of her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira Tlass vous dévisage comme si elle voyait un fantôme. Elle porte sur la tête un étrange appareil constitué d'un enchevêtrement de fils translucides venant former sur ses tempes un motif élaboré qui vous donne mal au cœur. Bon nombre de ces fils s'enfoncent dans la peau de son visage, de son cou et de ses épaules.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous êtes... {mf|vivant|vivante} ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira Tlass, sana hayalet görmüş gibi dik dik bakıyor. İdira'nın başında tuhaf ve tekinsiz bir cihaz duruyor: Sayısız ince ve saydam tel; İdira'nın şakaklarında karmaşık, korkunç desenler hâlinde sarılıp düğümlenmiş. Bu tellerden pek çoğu; İdira'nın yüzünden, boynundan ve köprücüğünden derisine giriyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Sen... Hayatta mısın?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira Tlass is staring at you as if she has seen a ghost. There is a strange, eerie-looking device on her head, a tangle of myriad thin, translucent threads coiled in elaborate, sickening patterns on her temples. Many of those threads penetrate the skin of her face, neck, and clavicles.{/n} "Lord Captain! You're... alive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira Tlass, sana hayalet görmüşçesine dik dik bakıyor. İdira'nın başında tuhaf ve tekinsiz bir cihaz duruyor: Sayısız ince ve saydam tel, İdira'nın şakaklarında karmaşık, korkunç desenler hâlinde sarılıp düğümlenmiş. Bu tellerden pek çoğu İdira'nın yüzünün, boynunun ve köprücüğünün derisine giriyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Sen... Hayatta mısın?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
